name: Homonculus (WilliamH)
description:
Game-a-Month 2021 #2 : Homonculus

William wakes up in a dreamscape and is stuck there until he defeats the distorted perceptions of himself, his homonculi. 

To do so he will collect Dice of Destiny that allow him to battle his way throught the end. 

Big thanks to Mathieu Martinet for the Character art! Marc D'Amico for the shader and FX help! And Walter Homs for the music !

This project would not have been nearly as impressive without your help.
